comments.body: It's also worth testing the behaviour of re-deleting an already absent filter  (should return "not changed")

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +120,124 @@          - out is changed

    - name: delete metric filter on '{{ log_group_name }}'
      cloudwatchlogs_log_group_metric_filter:
        log_group_name: '{{ log_group_name }}'

comments.body: The tasks in the `always` block need an `ignore_errors: true`. Otherwise for example, the log group won't be cleaned up if the delete metric filter task fails on permission errors.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +149,153 @@        log_group_name: '{{ log_group_name }}'
        filter_name: '{{ filter_name }}'
        state: absent

    - name: delete cloudwatch log group for integration test
